entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow near the Cariboo mountains early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow near the Cariboo mountains. Amount 5 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
